TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit ArraySegment`1<T> extends System.ValueType implements class System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1<!T>, class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<!T>, class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<!T>, class System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyCollection`1<!T>, class System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyList`1<!T>, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
Public Structure ArraySegment(Of T) Implements ICollection(Of T), IEnumerable(Of T), IList(Of T), IReadOnlyCollection(Of T), IReadOnlyList(Of T)

generic <typename T> public value class ArraySegment : System::Collections::Generic::ICollection<T>, System::Collections::Generic::IEnumerable<T>, System::Collections::Generic::IList<T>, System::Collections::Generic::IReadOnlyCollection<T>, System::Collections::Generic::IReadOnlyList<T>
type ArraySegment<'T> = struct interface IList<'T> interface IReadOnlyList<'T> interface ICollection<'T> interface seq<'T> interface IEnumerable interface IReadOnlyCollection<'T>

typeparam.name: T
typeparam.span: 陣列區段中的項目類型。

span.span: The type of the elements in the array segment.

summary.span: 分隔一維陣列的區段。

span.span: Delimits a section of a one-dimensional array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是用來分隔該陣列中的項目範圍的陣列包裝函式。 is a wrapper around an array that delimits a range of elements in that array. 多個執行個體可以參考相同的原始陣列，並且可以重疊。Multiple instances can refer to the same original array and can overlap. 原始陣列必須是一維的而且必須有以零為起始的索引。The original array must be one-dimensional and must have zero-based indexing. > [!NOTE] > 會實作開頭的介面[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]; 在舊版的.NET Framework 中，結構並未實作這個介面。 implements the interface starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]; in previous versions of the .NET Framework, the structure did not implement this interface. 每當要操作的陣列項目不同的區段中，結構是很有用。The structure is useful whenever the elements of an array will be manipulated in distinct segments. 例如：For example: - 您可以傳遞物件，做為引數的方法，表示陣列的一部分，而不是相當耗成本的方法要的呼叫傳遞陣列的一部分的複本。You can pass an object that represents only a portion of an array as an argument to a method, rather than call a relatively expensive method like to pass a copy of a portion of an array. - 在多執行緒應用程式中，您可以使用結構，讓每個執行緒對只包含陣列的一部分。In a multithreaded app, you can use the structure to have each thread operate on only a portion of the array. - 您可以使用以工作為基礎的非同步作業物件，以確定每個工作作陣列的獨特的區段。For task-based asynchronous operations, you can use an object to ensure that each task operates on a distinct segment of the array. 下列範例會將陣列分成個別的區段，且最多十個項目。The following example divides an array into individual segments with up to ten elements. 區段中的每個項目乘以其區段數目。Each element in the segment is multiplied by its segment number. 結果顯示使用類別來管理在這種方式中的項目變更其基礎陣列的值。The result shows that using the class to manipulate elements in this way changes the values of its underlying array. [!code-csharp[System.ArraySegment#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.ArraySegment/CS/segmentexample.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.ArraySegment#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.ArraySegment/VB/segmentexample.vb#2)] 不過請注意，雖然結構可以用於將陣列分成不同區段，區段不是完全獨立的另一個。Note, however, that although the structure can be used to divide an array into distinct segments, the segments are not completely independent of one another. 屬性會傳回整個原始陣列，而不是陣列的複本; 因此，所做的變更傳回的陣列屬性不會對原始陣列。The property returns the entire original array, not a copy of the array; therefore, changes made to the array returned by the property are made to the original array. 如果這不需要，您應該執行複製作業的陣列，而不是物件，表示陣列的一部分。If this is undesirable, you should perform operations on a copy of the array, rather than an object that represents a portion of the array. 方法和等號比較運算子相等和不等比較運算子測試參考是否相等時它們會比較兩個物件。The method and the equality and inequality operators test for reference equality when they compare two objects. 兩個物件才會被視為等於，他們必須符合所有下列條件：For two objects to be considered equal, they must meet all of the following conditions: - 參考相同的陣列。Reference the same array. - 在陣列中相同的索引開始。Begin at the same index in the array. - 有相同數目的項目。Have the same number of elements. 如果您想要在其索引來擷取項目物件，您必須將它轉換成物件並擷取它，或修改使用屬性。If you want to retrieve an element by its index in the object, you must cast it to an object and retrieve it or modify it by using the property. 下列範例會擷取中的項目分隔的字串陣列區段的物件。The following example retrieves the element in an object that delimits a section of a string array. [!code-csharp[System.ArraySegment.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.arraysegment.class/cs/example1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.ArraySegment.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.arraysegment.class/vb/example1.vb#1)] ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將結構的方法。The following code example passes an structure to a method. [!code-cpp[System.ArraySegment#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.ArraySegment/CPP/arraysegment.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.ArraySegment#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.ArraySegment/CS/arraysegment.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.ArraySegment#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.ArraySegment/VB/arraysegment.vb#1)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the structure that delimits all the elements in the specified array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會建立，用來分隔的所有項目`array`。This constructor creates an that delimits all the elements of `array`. 亦即的屬性為 0 並將其值的長度`array`。That is, the property of the is 0 and its property is the length of `array`. 若要建立，用來分隔只有陣列的一部分，請使用建構函式。To create an that delimits only part of an array, use the constructor. 原始陣列必須是一維的而且必須有以零為起始的索引。The original array must be one-dimensional and must have zero-based indexing. 多個執行個體可以參考相同的原始陣列，並且可以重疊。Multiple instances can refer to the same original array and can overlap. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將結構的方法。The following code example passes an structure to a method.
